title: fMRIPrep: a robust preprocessing pipeline for functional MRI
description: fMRIPrep is a robust and easy-to-use pipeline for preprocessing of diverse fMRI data. The transparent workflow dispenses of manual intervention, thereby ensuring the reproducibility of the results.
